about_the_game:
A young man on summer vacation tragically dies.
And even more tragically, goes to Hell!
Turns out Hell is not fire and brimstone.

Hell is a corporate office building.

And due to a major typo (caused by the overworked and underpaid intern, Yoshina), young Toru's soul is stuck in Hell until the mistakes can be fixed.
And YOU'RE going to fix them!
That means playing the devil on the shoulders of people schedule to die.

Travel into the bodies of 5 different people.
Chose bad decisions to ensure their timely demise.
If you do, the devil girls in accounting might let you go back to your body on Earth.
If you don't, you'll never get home.

Hell is a corporation and you’re on (unpaid) overtime! Get to work!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains some language, sexual references, and dark themes like death and the afterlife.

name: DEAD LAST - Part 1
